CURSE
Usage : cast 'curse' <victim | object> Accumulative: Yes Duration : 7 Days, permanent on objects. Level : Mage level 14.
Curse cast on a person that fails the saving throw, will reduce their hitroll and damage roll both by one. It will also reduce the saving throw versus paralysation by one.
When cast upon an object, the object will become undropable.
